title: Kerry Washington Sobs in the Rain in Netflix’s American Son Trailer
text:
Time is running out for Kerry Washington and Steven Pasquale in the first trailer for Netflix’s adaptation of the Christopher Demos-Brown Broadway drama, American Son. Forced to wait out the night and desperate for clues about their missing teenager’s whereabouts, the terrified parents are two of “four distinct viewpoints” in the film, which tackles race, policing, and parental love against the backdrop of a South Florida police station. Washington and Pasquale, along with Jeremy Jordan and Eugene Lee, reprise their theatrical roles for Tony-winning director Kenny Leon, who also directed the stage play. American Son debuts on Netflix November 1.
